name: TheBeautyofTheButterfly Demo
description:
The Beauty of The Butterfly is an a platform game, your mission is pass all the levels and help the monarch butterfly to go to his destiny, the game is totally made for enjoy the music, the enviroment and all the game.
NOTE: From the level 5-20 the game turns so harder but you feel so good when you pass the level :).
Thanks for buy the game and wait for more :)
The game have some bugs but any bug affect the gameplay
